activities.name: Cardio
activities.details: These workouts include jogging, bicycling, power walking, swimming, and aerobics.
activities.doIt: Aim for 60 minutes of low-intensity cardio deaily

activities.name: Jump rope
activities.details: It improves your coordination and cognitive function and elevates your heart rate.
activities.doIt: Complete 3 sets of jump continuously for 1 1/2 minutes.

activities.name: Pushups
activities.details: It is for stabilizing the core, building upper body strength, & increasing muscle mass.

activities.name: Lunges
activities.details: you can do them forward, backward, weighted and unweighted.
activities.doIt: Complete 3 set of 8 to 12 lunges per leg.

activities.name: Burpees
activities.details: It is combine squats, jumps, and pushups. It burn your fat from overall body,
activities.doIt: Do 10 reps in 30 seconds. Repeat for 5 minutes.

activities.name: Step-ups
activities.details: It help to strengthen the legs while stabilizing your core and lower back muscles.
activities.doIt: Complete 5 sets of 5 to 10 reps per side.
